page.title: 06INTERVIEWING A RESIDENT
page.content: My partner and I went to interview Mrs.Ormston.We asked her twenty five questions.She and her family are the newest people who have come to Littleton.Here are two questions which we asked Mrs.Ormston.Do you have a big house?She said yes.What kind of job do you do for a living?She is a maths teacher and a mother. Mrs.Ormston moved into Littleton because her husband works in Winchester and where they used to live it would take an hour to get to work and an hour back.They also moved to Littleton because her children were at Private Schools and it took too long to get to their school.Now it takes about half an hour to get to work and it takes about half an hour to take her children to school.Mrs.Ormston has got brown curly hair and she is very kind!
